objects.specification: A smooth white plaster wall, forming the front boundary of the classroom, with a subtle matte finish for a clean and bright appearance.
A smooth white plaster wall, forming the back boundary of the classroom, seamlessly reflecting light for an airy feel.
A smooth white plaster wall, forming the left boundary of the classroom, offering a neutral backdrop for educational displays.
A smooth white plaster wall, forming the right boundary of the classroom, perfect for mounting additional fixtures.
A smooth white tile floor, providing a bright and durable surface for the entire classroom.
A larger teacher desk made of medium-toned polished wood, featuring a spacious tabletop and reinforced legs for stability.
A comfortable cushioned teacher’s chair with an ergonomic backrest, upholstered in a muted complementary fabric for extended seating comfort.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a sleek aluminum frame and a glossy white surface for high-contrast writing and easy cleaning.
A ceiling-mounted projector in a white metal housing, aligned precisely with the whiteboard for clear image projection.
A rectangular fluorescent ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel for bright and even illumination.
A rectangular fluorescent ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel for bright and even illumination.

A large rectangular window with a slim frame and clear glass, fitted with side-mounted curtain rods for soft natural lighting.
A fabric curtain panel in a muted complementary tone, gently pleated and hanging from the rod.
A fabric curtain panel in a muted complementary tone, gently pleated and hanging from the rod.
A tall wooden bookshelf with six open shelves, each filled with a variety of colorful hardcover books, finished in medium wood tone.
A tall wooden bookshelf with six open shelves, each filled with a variety of colorful hardcover books, finished in medium wood tone.
A round wall clock with a black rim, white face, and bold black numerals, mounted above the window for easy viewing.
An educational poster with bright graphics and labeled diagrams, showcasing classroom rules in a visual format.

A decorative potted plant with large green leaves in a simple terracotta pot, adding a fresh atmosphere.

A simple plastic waste bin in a neutral gray, placed for easy disposal of classroom waste.
A simple plastic waste bin in a neutral gray, placed at the back corner for student use.
